snippet: Mr. Rohr, who made a fortune in real estate after fleeing the Nazis, was honored by his children in 2006 with the creation of the Sami Rohr Prize for Jewish Literature.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rohr, who made a fortune in real estate after fleeing the Nazis, was honored by his children in 2006 with the creation of the Sami Rohr Prize for Jewish Literature.

headline.seo: Sami Rohr, Jewish Philanthropist Remembered by a Writing Prize, Dies at 86
